channel.title: Moving ur home?
channel.description:
i dont like the current home i have atm so i was wonderign if some1 could help me move my homr and also how do i move the portals and my npc's over there too?? and when i put in a new portal how do i decide where ti teleports u?? thanks for reading :)
-Pure Jukes

item.title: Moving ur home?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_jukes Pure jukes
item.description:
@Pure_jukes wrote:

but i want to make a competely new portal to go to a different place and when i copied and pasted it and changed the name and the coords then compiled it sed 1 error cuz it was a duped portal id… help plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 12:21:22 PM[/size][hr]oh nvm i figured out how…thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Moving ur home?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Search in player.java for those coords of the old one and change them to new one

item.title: Moving ur home?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_jukes Pure jukes
item.description:
@Pure_jukes wrote:

ok i changed my home now do i make it so when a new character logs in they are at the new home instead of the old one

Read full topic

item.title: Moving ur home?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well for the home look where the coords are when you are home and search for those in client.java and change them to wherever you like. For the portals search for case:(portals id) under that it will have like teleportx teleporty or something like that and change them to where you want the portal to bring you. To move the portals themselves right click it and search for those coords in client.java also and change them. Hope i helped

Read full topic
